oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Tiffani Zuch Oral History Interview, 2011 April 16
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Tiffani Zuch, conducted on 16 April 2011 by Robin Robinson as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. Tiffani describes the flooding of her Pennington Bend neighborhood, her evacuation by boat, and the aftermath of the flooding.
The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Zuch, Tiffani 1982- --Interviews
